name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fabric web clipper – save anything from the web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🍱 All your stuff in one place. 👋 Collaborate on anything.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Get started free with your Fabric account

A beautiful personal explorer for your digital world, trusted by thousands of researchers, creators, and professionals. 

Save your inspiration and research to fabric — an intelligent workspace for collecting, organizing, and discovering web content. Find anything instantly with AI search and collaborate in real-time.


• • •
CORE FEATURES
• • •

UNIVERSAL SAVE 🌎
– Save anything: articles, images, videos, PDFs, and entire web pages
– More than a bookmark manager — capture complete content with visual previews

SMART ORGANIZATION ⚡️
– AI-powered automatic tagging and organization
– Spaces, custom tags, and filters keep everything findable

AI SEARCH & DISCOVERY 🔍
– Natural language search across all your content
– Just describe what you're looking for — it's like having a perfect memory
– Get AI summaries and insights from your saved content

REAL-TIME COLLABORATION 👥
– Work together with live updates and shared cursors
– See instant notifications as your team contributes
– Skip the back-and-forth of email chains and group chats

AI CHAT ASSISTANT 💬
– Chat with your knowledge base using natural language
– Get answers and insights from your saved content
– Connect with Google Drive, Notion, and more [Coming Soon]

CROSS-PLATFORM ACCESS 📲
– Use Fabric anywhere — browser, mobile, desktop
– Everything syncs automatically across all your devices


• • •
PERFECT FOR
• • •

– Finding inspiration & references for creative projects
– Organizing research materials and sources
– Building a searchable team knowledge base
– Saving articles to read later with AI summaries
– Creating visual collections for any project


• • •
PRIVACY & SECURITY
• • •

Your data security is our priority. All content is encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (SSL/TLS). Learn more about our privacy commitment: https://fabric.so/privacy


• • •
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
• • •

– Works with Chrome, Edge, Brave, and other Chromium browsers. We don't officially support Arc yet.
– Compatible with Windows, Mac, and ChromeOS
– Mobile apps available for iOS and Android


• • •
CONNECT WITH US
• • •

Email: team@fabric.so
Twitter: @fabricinternet

#AI #Productivity #Research #VisualInspiration #KnowledgeManagement #WebClipper #PersonalLibrary
